amendment.description: An amendment numbered 8 printed in the Congressional Record to add the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency and Director of the Bureau of Indian Affairs to the list of officials to be consulted in the Compensatory Production Increase Plan.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cleaver amendment (A008) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Cleaver.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Cleaver amendment (A008) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
